title: Die Iovis. 23. Martii. 1643. It is this day ordered by [the] Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that no person or persons whatsoever, doe at any time from henceforth buy, sell, or take to pawn or exchange any horse, horses, muskets carabines, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for John Wright. and are to be sold in the Old Baily,
